word:
I asked Mrs. Winter, the president, if it was her custom to read a portion of Scriptures at the opening of the meeting. She said that it was. I then asked for the privilege of praying, which was gladly granted. I spoke with freedom to them for 


                            -239- 

an hour. Some of the women present that night afterward attended the meetings in the tent.            (Unpublished MS.) 

                                               -
